org.conqat.lib.commons.serialization

Class SerializedEntitySerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.serialization.SerializedEntitySerializer

  • public class SerializedEntitySerializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Serializes serialized entities (objects + classes) back to a stream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerHandle(SerializedEntityBase entity)
      Registers an entity for a handle to be referenceable later on.

      Serializes an annotation list as found in objectAnnotation and classAnnotation.

      Serializes the object defined by the given handle.
      void serializeStringObject(java.lang.String value)
      Serializes a string as an object.

      Serializes a string as an object.
      static byte[] serializeToBytes(java.util.List<SerializedEntityBase> entities)
      Serializes a pool to a raw array.
      static void serializeToStream(java.util.List<SerializedEntityBase> entities, java.io.DataOutputStream dos)
      Serializes a pool to a data output stream.

      Serializes a pool to an output stream.

      Writes a raw block of data.

      Attempts to write a reference to this object if it has been written before.

      • serializeAnnotationList

        public void serializeAnnotationList(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> rawDataList,
                                    SerializedEntityPool pool)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Serializes an annotation list as found in objectAnnotation and classAnnotation. Note that this has nothing to do with Java annotations (the language feature), but rather is a list consisting of raw data (byte arrays) and handles (int).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • serializeObject

        public static void serializeObject(int handle,
                                   java.lang.Class<? extends SerializedEntityBase> expectedType,
                                   SerializedEntityPool pool,
                                   java.io.DataOutputStream dos,
                                   SerializedEntitySerializer serializer)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Serializes the object defined by the given handle. Also accepts the null handle.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeReference

        public boolean writeReference(SerializedEntityBase entity)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Attempts to write a reference to this object if it has been written before. Returns whether a reference could be written. This may not be used for strings (SerializedStringObject).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • registerHandle

        public void registerHandle(SerializedEntityBase entity)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Registers an entity for a handle to be referenceable later on.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
